body:
You can create shared service or handle it like that:

file1.component.ts

import { Component } from "@angular/core";
@Component({
    selector: "search",
    templateUrl: '
                  <div>Hello{{testData}}</div>'
})

export class File1Component{
public testData = "Hello";

getTestData(){
   return this.testData;
}

}

file2.component.ts

import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core";
@Component({
    selector: "profile",
    templateUrl: '<div>Hello</div>'
})

export class File2Component{
  @Input() inputData: any;

}

app.component.ts

import { Component } from "@angular/core";
@Component({
    selector: "app",
    templateUrl:'<search #varSearch></search>
                 <profile [inputData]="varSearch.getTestData()"></profile>'
})

export class File2Component{


}
title: Passing data from Component to another Component two files
